com.vgrs.xcode.util
Class Datafile

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.vgrs.xcode.util.Datafile
public class Datafile
extends java.lang.Object

Provides capability to retrieve data from compressed file from system resource or a plain text from local file system.

getReader

public static java.io.BufferedReader getReader(java.lang.String file)
                                        throws XcodeException
Deprecated. This method exists solely for use with reading data from a plain text file. The method has been deprecated because we no longer ship plain text data file in SDK library.

Open the plain text file from the search path used to load classes. BufferedReader of the file.
Parameters:
file - a file to read
Returns:
BufferedReader object
Throws:
XcodeException - if an input stream for reading the file could not be found

getIterator

public static java.util.Iterator getIterator(java.lang.String file)
                                      throws XcodeException
Retrieve data from a gz/zip file from the search path used to load classes. If it is a plain text file, try also to read from local file system.
Parameters:
file - a file name
Returns:
an Iterator object of the file
